title: Beet-Red Cheeks
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>*Huff*, *Huff*.... Phew~, that was exhausting!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Are you okay, Honoka-chan? Did we go a bit too fast?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I’m fine, I’m fine. I thought it’d be hard at first, but I couldn’t care less anymore when I saw the ocean. I love the idea of using the beach as a running course~. I’m so jealous~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ahaha, thanks. It’s nice to look at the ocean while running, right? I also like running here.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>It feels great~. Ah, your cheeks are so red, You-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Yours are too, Honoka-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>No no no, yours are definitely redder than mine.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Then let’s make yours even redder. Squeeeeze~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Uwaaah! Geez, it’s payback time~! Squeeze!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>I’m not gonna lose!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
